title: MD
biography: Pyaar Zindagi Hai is a 2001 Indian Hindi-language romantic thriller film directed by Vijay Sadanah. It is a remake of the Tamil film Aasai (1995). The film stars Ashima Bhalla, Vikas Kalantri and Mohnish Bahl and was produced by K.C. Bokadia under the banner of BMB Pictures.
aiSummary: S. P. Kalantri is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 34 at Evidence-based pediatrics (Member). Has been published in JAMA, The Lancet Infectious Diseases, Nature Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
